data.title: Always the Best Music
data.meta_description: Find out when you can listen to your favourite Smooth Radio shows and presenters, including Kate Garraway, Myleene Klass, Jenni Falconer and The Smooth Sanctuary.
data.text:
On Now: 4am - 6am

Early Breakfast with Gary King

Gary King with the best songs to start the day on Smooth Radio.

Listen

Next: 6am - 10am

Smooth Breakfast with John Mellis

Smooth's start to the day with John Mellis across Scotland every weekday morning!

10am - 1pm

Myleene Klass

Myleene has the best music to soundtrack your morning. Join in @SmoothRadio.

1pm - 4pm

Paul Phear

Paul Phear keeps you company all afternoon from Monday to Friday with the best music. Join in @SmoothRadio.

4pm - 7pm

Angie Greaves

Angie Greaves has the best music every weekday from 4 to 7pm.

7pm - 10pm

The Smooth Sanctuary with Gary Vincent

Unwind with the most relaxing music, in the Smooth Sanctuary with Gary Vincent. Join in @SmoothRadio.
